Help.Text:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                       C P S   P R I M I T I V E
 
 Name       : TETRAMOD
 Category   : io
 Written    : 2004-04-19   by: Bill Done
 Revised    : 2006-10-31   by: Brian Macy
 Maturity   : production
 Purpose    : Read, write, and convert from hdf format tetrahedral model files.
 Portability: No known limitations.
 Parallel   : No.
 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                          GENERAL DESCRIPTION
 
 --> Insert description information here.
 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                          ADVICE FOR USERS
 
 --> Insert advice to the user here.
 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                             REVISION HISTORY
 
     Date        Author     Description
     ----        ------     -----------
  4. 2006-10-31  Brian macy Changed temporary memory allocation in
                            tetramod_shift_facets() subroutine to allocate
                            num_facets elements instead of max_num_facets.
                            Added interface to tetramod_shift_facets() to
                            allow specification of standard out unit.
003. 2006-01-10  B. Menger   Removed Unused Variables.
  2. 2005-09-12  Bill Done  In subroutines tetramod_read_model() and
                            tetramod_read_header(), initialize the array of
                            region names to ' '. This avoids the compile
                            error that reg_names must be initialized if it
                            has attribute intent(out).
  1. 2004-04-20  Bill Done  Initial version.
 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
